title: Date A Live II: Kurumi Star Festival
synopsis: On the day of the Tanabata festival, Shidou Itsuka happens to meet the eerie Kurumi Tokisaki, who proceeds to ask him out on a date. Although nervous, Shidou accepts the offer. The two spend their time visiting to a planetarium, buying food at the festival, and trying out a mock wedding ceremony. Meanwhile, Shirou's friends—Tooka Yatogami, Yoshino, and Kotori Itsuka—are looking for him, while also enjoying the festival themselves.
related_anime: ['Date A Live: Encore', 'Date A Live II']
staff: [['Marchi, Jamie', ['Script']], ['Jewell, Jerry', ['ADR Director']], ['Tsunako', ['Original Character Design']], ['Tachibana, Koushi', ['Original Creator']]]
